command_category.name: Activities
command_category.decription: Activities designate areas where your colonists will attempt to perform actions, such as chopping trees and mining surface nodes.

command_category.name: Buildings
command_category.description: Buildings are what define our Civilization and separate us from the animals - using buildings designated within, we may work, sleep, pray, and toast the health of Her Majesty The Queen!

command_subcategory.name: Workshops
command_subcategory.description: Workshops are the center of Colonial Industry, where labourers transform raw resources into useful commodities.

command.name: Carpentry Workshop
command.description: The most fundamental of colony buildings, necessary for wordworking, furniture building, and many other things.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

commodity.display_text: You need 2 units of logs or bamboo at minimum.
You need 1 unit of stone at minimum.

command.name: Kitchen
command.description: Necessary for the cooking of raw food into a Proper Meal, your colonists will want one of these up and running sooner than later.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum.

command.name: Ceramics Workshop
command.description: An intermediate production workshop, the Ceramics Workshop allows the working of stone and clay into vital construction materials and modules.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Chemical Works
command.description: A specialized production workshop, the Chemical works enables production of gunpowder, medicinal tonics, and other potent concoctions - if you have the unusual ingredients to make them.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum.

command.name: Metalworks
command.description: An advanced production workshop, the Metalworks facilitates the building of a great many things, including metal modules, weaponry, and more.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Steam Knight Manufactory
command.description: An Ultra-Advanced workshop, the Steam Knight Manufactory focuses a truly obscene amount of commodities into a single focus: Building Steam Knights, the Ultimate Weapon.

require_session_bool.name: discovery_steelworking_steamknight
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Requires researching Steam Knight Tech at laboratory.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: iron_ingots
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of iron ingots at minimum (crafted at the Metalworks Workshop).

require_session_bool.name: discovery_steelworking_steamknight
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Requires researching Steam Knight Tech at laboratory.

command_subcategory.name: Foreign Outreach
command_subcategory.description: Whether you want to protect your colony from outside influence or reach out and make a friend, Foreign Outreach buildings will help you control your place in the world.

command.name: Barracks
command.description: A fundamental colony building, Overseers assigned here will become your colony's military and keep your colonists safe.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

commodity.display_text: You need 2 units of logs at minimum.

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Trade Office
command.description: Having a Trade Office allows you to buy, sell and trade goods, and will draw merchants to visit the colony.

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Foreign Office
command.description: The Foreign Office allows us to interact with other factions, improving our relationships and allowing us to ask for favors.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

command_subcategory.name: Frontier Exploitation
command_subcategory.description: With these buildings, the wonders of the frontier are yours to seize - whether it be ores, strange creatures, or forbidden knowledge.

command.name: Mine
command.description: Mines enable extraction of valuable ores and minerals from the stygian depths - build them near product beacons to make them even more effective.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 3 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Naturalist's Office
command.description: A base for Those Who Venture, Naturalists are capable of exploring, discovering resource veins for mines, or hunting animals.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

command.name: Laboratory
command.description: A home for the noble Pursuit of Science - assign crews here to research Frontier Technologies that improve your colony and expand the modules and products you can build.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

command_subcategory.name: Public Services
command_subcategory.description: Productivity requires a podsnappery populace - Public Services buildings will keep colonists happy and help them make the most of themselves.

command.name: Public House
command.description: A place of drinking and good cheer! Supplies booze to your thirsty workers at the end of a long day, keeping them happy and productive.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 5 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 3 units of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Barbershop
command.description: On the Frontier, it is the Barber who must tend to the sick, injured, and mustachioed - if you have injured colonists, this will enable them to recover.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

command.name: Chapel
command.description: A place of worship for members of the Church of Divine Mechanics; fights malign influence and improves colonists' moods.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: lacquered_planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of lacquered planks minimum (crafted at the Chemical Works Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Training Academy
command.description: A storeplace of knowledge and sanctum of frontier learning, the Training Academy allows Overseers to quickly increase their skills.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_commodity_geq.name: lacquered_planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of lacquered planks minimum (crafted at the Chemical Works Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command_subcategory.name: Housing
command_subcategory.description: Housing is essential for keeping your colonists sleeping happily, and also increase your Population Cap.

command.name: Lower Class House
command.description: A simple but functional bunkhouse which fulfills the unsophisticated domestic requirements of the common labourer.

commodity.display_text: You need 2 units of logs at minimum.

require_commodity_geq.name: rough_stone_block
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of stone at minimum (harvested from a Mine or by Mining Surface Nodes).

command.name: Middle Class House
command.description: A stimulating domicile to meet the domestic needs of middle-class overseers and artisans.

require_commodity_geq.name: planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of planks minimum (crafted at the Carpentry Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 1 unit of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

command.name: Upper Class House
command.description: An ostentatious display of Clockworkian architecture designed for the needs of the upper-classes. Homes for your Betters must be constructed before they will deign to immigrate to your colony.

require_commodity_geq.name: lacquered_planks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of lacquered planks minimum (crafted at the Chemical Works Workshop).

require_commodity_geq.name: bricks
require_commodity_geq.failure_reason: You need 2 units of bricks at minimum (crafted at the Ceramics Workshop).

command_category.name: Modules
command_category.description: These are the doors, windows, workbenches, beds, decor, machines, and all the sundry components which allow a building to do whatever it was built to do.

command_category.name: Farms
command_category.description: Herein lie your agricultural opportunities. More crop types may be unlocked via the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_maize
command.description: A staple crop with standard growth and yield, used to make necessities of life such as chowder and moonshine.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate,biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Wheat can only be grown in a temperate or desert climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: maize_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this crop in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_wheat
command.description: This slow-growing grain has a massive yield that outclasses starter crops, assuming you can keep the pests away. Can be used to make bread, beer, or healthful gruel.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate,biomeCold
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Wheat can only be grown in temperate and cold climates.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: wheat_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_coconut_palm
command.description: A slow-growing tree with a delightfully large yield, adapted from the wild, that produces coconuts once mature.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical,biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Coconut Palms can only be grown in the tropics.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: coconut_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_bamboo
command.description: The Bamboo plant can be used in place of timber, assuming you can accept the slow growth time.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical,biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Bamboo can only be grown in a tropical or desert climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: bamboo_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_larch
command.description: The Larch can be grown as a renewable source of timber, though the growth time is long.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate,biomeCold
require_session_bool.failure_reason: The Larch can only be grown in a temperate or cold climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: larch_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_chillies
command.description: Fast-growing but small in yield, this spicy plant is a good stopgap but a poor staple crop.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical,biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Chillies can only be grown in a tropical or desert climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

command.name: farm_agave
command.description: A slow-growing desert crop that yields a sweet syrup that can be processed into useful drinks.

require_session_bool.name: biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Agave must be grown in the desert.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

command.name: farm_prickly_pear
command.description: An excellent crop that thrives in desert territory far beyond temperate-preferring plants like maize.

require_session_bool.name: biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Prickly Pear grows only in the desert.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: pricklypear_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_flax
command.description: A low-value cash crop suitable to cold climates.

require_session_bool.name: biomeCold
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Flax can only be grown in a cold climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

command.name: farm_cabbage
command.description: A cold-tolerant crop with mediocre yield at best. Used to make a hearty peasant stew.

require_session_bool.name: biomeCold
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Lingonberries can only be grown in cold climates.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

command.name: farm_lingonberries
command.description: Lovely red berries from the north, these bushes make for a superior food yield in colder climes.

require_session_bool.name: biomeCold
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Lingonberries can only be grown in cold climates.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: lingonberry_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_pumpkin
command.description: A true wonder of nature, the mighty Antipodean Pumpkin simply cannot be beaten when it comes to massive crop yields.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Pumpkins can only be grown in a temperate climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: pumpkin_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_grapes
command.description: A surprisingly dangerous vine that grows clusters of tasty grapes, this plant is great for producing food or alcohol.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Grapes can only be grown in a temperate climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: grape_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_tobacco
command.description: Valued for its leaves, which can be made into cigars; a solid colonial cash crop.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Tea can only be grown in a temperate climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: tobacco_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_sugarcane
command.description: Slow-growing, high-yield Sugarcane plant, for the production of sugar and alcohol fermentation.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Sugarcane can only be grown in tropical zones.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

command.name: farm_lacquer
command.description: The slow-growing lacquer tree, adapted from the wild, can be tapped for Lacquer once mature.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Lacquer Plants can only be grown in tropical zones.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: lacquer_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_opium
command.description: This finicky poppy is used in the manufacture of the finest Opium and Laudanum - an astronomically valuable cash crop.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical,biomeDesert
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Opium can only be grown in the tropics.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: opium_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_coffee
command.description: A highland shrub which can produce a stimulating drink. A good, if tempermental, cash crop.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Coffee can only be grown in the tropics.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

require_session_bool.name: coffee_technology_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: You need to research this technology in the Laboratory.

command.name: farm_tea
command.description: A foreign plant which produces very fine leaves for brewing Tea. A common cash crop in colonies or at home, its value is low due to its wide accessability.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTropical
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Tea can only be grown in a tropical climate.

require_session_int_geq.name: workplacesAvailable
require_session_int_geq.failure_reason: You have hit or exceeded the Workplace Cap. Build more Overseer housing to attract more overseers and increase the Workplace Cap!

command_category.name: Structures
command_category.description: Various and sundry outdoor activities and constructables lie within.

command.name: Stockpile
command.description: Stockpiles allow colonists to place commodities into efficient, organized zones.

command.name: Graveyard
command.description: It is important to the health and mood of your colonists to bury the dead in a graveyard.

command.name: Airship Mast
command.description: An airship mast allows (mostly) precision delivery of essential goods and cargo by the Airship Corps.

command.name: Gabion (High)
command.description: Crude fortifications. Cleverly applied, these may vex invaders.

command.name: Gabion (Low)
command.description: Crude fortifications. Cleverly applied, these may vex invaders.

command.name: Landmine
command.description: A dishonourable weapon, these will automatically detonate when trod upon by the feet and flippers of your enemies.

command.name: Lamp (Small)
command.description: A free-standing lamp, for keeping the darkness at bay.

command.name: Lamp (Medium)
command.description: A free-standing lamp, for keeping the darkness at bay.

command.name: Lamp (Large)
command.description: A free-standing lamp, for keeping the darkness at bay.

command.name: Plant Grass
command.description: Plant some grass to liven things up.

command.name: Plant Shrubbery
command.description: Plant some shrubbery to liven things up.

command.name: Plant Flowers
command.description: Plant some flowers to liven things up.

command_category.name: Commands
command_category.description: A collection of commands and designations. Micromanagement, yay!

command.name: Dismantle Objects
command.description: Designates a non-building, non-zone construction for removal.

command.name: Flatten
command.description: Orders the Civilizing of displeasingly rumpled landscape features.

command.name: Rally Squad
command.description: Send your troops to the designated spot and their certain doom.

command.name: Chop Down
command.description: Designates a region where colonists will harvest timber.

command.name: Mine Surface Nodes
command.description: Designates a region where colonists will harvest stone, clay, and other surface minerals and ore.

command.name: Forage
command.description: Designates a region where colonists will forage for food resources.

command.name: Clear Terrain
command.description: Designates a region where colonists will clear debris and obstructions from terrain.

command.name: Explore
command.description: Order a Naturalist to explore around a particular area.
